httpServletRequestX
Class HttpServletRequestX

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
          httpServletRequestX.HttpServletRequestXWrapper
              httpServletRequestX.HttpServletRequestX
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest
public class HttpServletRequestX
extends HttpServletRequestXWrapper

This library wraps the HttpServletRequest and provides a set of convenience functions to handle the accept content type options.

Author:
Marco Reinwarth
